articles.title: Kari Lake says OAN's far-right coverage will fuel Voice of America - NPR
articles.description: Senior presidential adviser Kari Lake says Voice of America will rely on coverage from the far-right OAN network. OAN has offered unwavering support of President Trump.
articles.content:
Senior presidential adviser Kari Lake appears to have resolved any doubts about what she wants to do with the Voice of America.
Lake seeks for it to look and sound a lot like the far-right One Ameri… [+8574 chars]

articles.author: Cindy Von Quednow, Danny Freeman
articles.title: REAL ID is now required for air travel in America. Here’s what to expect at airports across the US - CNN
articles.description: The time has come. Starting Wednesday, passengers nationwide must a use state-issued ID or license that is “REAL ID” complaint to travel within the US.
articles.content:
The time has come. Starting Wednesday, passengers nationwide must use astate-issued ID or license that is REAL ID compliant to travel within the US.
